items.name: Essence of Music
items.customDescription: Used to upgrade hired bard instruments. Unlocks a 5th modifier when upgraded.

items.name: Polished Topaz Gem
items.customDescription: Can be socketed into hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Music GP when socketed.

items.name: Polished Ruby Gem
items.customDescription: Can be socketed into hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Music Skill XP when socketed.

items.name: Polished Sapphire Gem
items.customDescription: Can be socketed into hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Music Mastery XP when socketed.

items.name: Diamond String
items.customDescription: Can be applied hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Sheet Music drop chance when applied.

items.name: Pristine Leather
items.customDescription: Can be applied hired bard instruments. Grants -5% Music Interval when applied.

items.name: Mystic Oil
items.customDescription: Can be applied hired bard instruments. Grants +1 Unlock tier for instrument without needing to meet mastery level when applied.

items.name: Concert Pass Half (A)
items.customDescription: Used with Concert Pass Half (B) to purchase a Concert Pass.

items.name: Concert Pass Half (B)
items.customDescription: Used with Concert Pass Half (A) to purchase a Concert Pass.

items.name: Concert Pass
items.customDescription: When worn and training the Music skill, gain Skill XP per charge in the skills the instrument supports.

items.name: Bards Hat
items.customDescription:
+2% Music Skill XP
With all four Bards Outfit equipped: +8% Music Mastery XP

items.name: Bards Body
items.customDescription:
+2% Music Skill XP
With all four Bards Outfit equipped: +8% Music Mastery XP

items.name: Bards Leggings
items.customDescription:
+2% Music Skill XP
With all four Bards Outfit equipped: +8% Music Mastery XP

items.name: Bards Boots
items.customDescription:
+2% Music Skill XP
With all four Bards Outfit equipped: +8% Music Mastery XP

shopPurchases.customDescription: Unlock the ability to hire 2 different bards in Music.

masteryLevelUnlocks.description: Each level provides +10 GP acquired for this instrument only.
Each level increases the bard hire cost up to a max of 200M GP.
-10% Bard Hire Cost for this instrument only.
